name: Jet Set Knights
description: Jet Set Knights is an old-school arcade action platformer inspired by classics from the golden age such as Mario Bros, Snow Bros or newest Super Crate Box. If You love retro 2D platformers mixed with tower defense and RPG elements, Jet Set Knight is for You!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 Processor: 1.8 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT/s 4xx or Equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 Processor: 2.4 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 600 Series or Higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Jet Set Knights is good old arcade. Simple gameplay doesn't make the game worse.
Does not work with Steam Link.
